Methods : A total 79 adult diabetes randomly assign treatment olive leaf extract capsule match placebo . Measures glucose homeostasis include glucose , insulin HbA1c measure compare treatment group .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Olive Leaves Hypoglycemic Agents Diabetic Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The present study randomize , double blind , placebo control , clinical trial 14 week duration . Patients randomize treatment tablet olive leave match placebo 1:1 ratio . Patients instructed consume diet consistent ADA recommendation exercise train program prescribe . Weight , height , systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) measure subject begin end study . Venous blood sample draw overnight fast less 12 hour . Laboratory test include fast blood glucose ( FBG ) , HbA1c , insulin , lipid panel liver renal function . A total 79 subject ( 51 men , 28 woman ) age 18-79 year type 2 diabetes mellitus , recruit followed outpatient clinic . The subject select series 93 consecutive diabetic patient . Eligible patient diagnose T2DM least 1 year . Subjects randomize treatment olive leaf extract pill ( 1 500 mg pill daily take orally ) match placebo . The intervention prepare follow : olive leaf pick Barnea cultivar Jezreel Valley region Israel immediately freeze-dried dry ice . After leave thoroughly rinse sterile distilled water remove dust , insecticide , contaminate material , leave ground successively Soxhlet extract hexane 3 h 80 % aqueous ethanol 6 h. The alcoholic extract concentrate reduced pressure 25 °C , reconstitute 30 % ethanol water . Olive leaf placebo tablet take daily orally throughout study . All subject continue stable treatment diabetes . Data analyze use SPSS v10.0 ( SPSS Inc. , Chicago , USA ) . Continuous data describe mean ± standard deviation compare treatment assignment use t-test independent sample . Associations continuous variable describe calculate Pearson 's correlation coefficient . Nominal variable sex treatment assignment describe use frequency count compare treatment assignment use chi square test ( exact appropriate ) . All test two-sided consider significant p < 0.05 .
